prompt:
You will see metadata from the newest email thread. Decide if the sender is a potential sales lead.

Output EXACTLY this, one line each:
Lead: yes|no — one short reason (<=12 words)
Category: inbound|partner|support|spam|other — best guess
If Lead is yes, also output:
NextAction: reply now | ask for info | schedule follow-up
ReplyDraft: 3-6 short sentences in the same language as the email; if Lead is no, write: None
